name: Sewing Kit Charm Necklace
description:
This necklace is the perfect sewing kit of charms! It has a silver sewing machine and cloth scissor charms, with a small purple ribbon on the side. The ribbon represents the sweetness of the outfits Granny made and the scissors make me smile because of my inherited obsession for different scissors for different tasks. (You can hear me holler from the other end of the house if I spy MrLB lifting my cloth scissors to cut paper!)

This necklace would make the perfect gift for any girl who is learning to sew, has been sewing for years or has memories of women in her life sat at the machine!

name: Silver Camera Girl Charm Necklace
description:
Back in stock!

Everybody say CHEESE! I love this necklace, the vintage look silver charm is so detailed quirky. I have added a soft pink mother of pearl gemstone and an aqua coloured glass bead cup and these hang from a silver plated 16" chain.

This charm necklace would make the ideal gift for any girl who loves taking snaps or being in them!
